posts.post_title: Nice n28 Caruthers PSA 4 for sale - card sold
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian McQueen
Terrific looking card. No creases, edgewear or significant staining. The corners are mostly sharp as well with only slight touches. There is a qualifier on the card due to a hard-to-see pinkish looking printer's line on the back of the card towards the top.  Overall, still a very attractive piece though. Asking $285 delivered. 

Thanks in advance,
Brian
redmaccie@hotmail.com
